name: New Ghost City
description:
For hundreds of years the Well of Life and Death has unleashed lost souls upon the living. Your job is to build a new city to house the ghosts so they can have peace.

CREDITS:

music:

Latin Rhythm by Sunsearcher (2013) (CC BY-SA 3.0)(remix)

sound:
